title: 17th SAARC Summit: Ends strengthening regional ties
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The 17th SAARC Heads of State Summit concluded on a high note this evening on 11 November in the Addu city in Maldives after four (4) agreements were signed to further strengthen and improve the cooperation of the SAARC region….
